game_description: This Game Has a Unique Locomotion System Where You Move with Your 2 Arms Moving and Running a Cross the Map. You Are A Monke Play with Other Monke Friends and Have a Great Time Until You Meet 7D8D... He's No Good.
review_1: Why did monkey friends become a gorilla tag copy with the same files man like cmon I liked the horror mode, the cosmetics and all that stuff I really don't know if a hacker did this or boxy did this I just want old monkey friends back instead of some gorilla tag duplicated game and yeah, that's all I have to say
review_2: I HAVE GOTTEN HACKED THEY SUSPENED MY OCULUS ACCOUNT EVEN THO I DIDNT DO ANYTHING BUT THEN THE HACKER HACKED ME SO I GOT HACKED THEN THEY SWITCHED IT TO A GTAG COPY I HAVE A NEW GAME CALLED GIBSON PLAY IT ITS BETTER THAN MONKE FRIENDS! - Boxxy
review_3: The game is a copy because it got hacked but then the owner thought it was nice and then lost the file for the game so yea there you go
review_5: this game went from an actual fan game to a gorilla tag ripoff and i want to know why this happened PLEASE TELL ME
